properties.name: default_open
properties.description: The open state of the dropdown menu when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

properties.name: open
properties.description: The controlled open state of the dropdown menu. Must be used in conjunction with onOpenChange.

properties.name: modal
properties.description: The modality of the dropdown menu. When set to true, interaction with outside elements will be disabled and only menu content will be visible to screen readers. Defaults to True.

properties.name: dir
properties.description: The reading direction of submenus when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

DropdownMenuTrigger.name: DropdownMenuTrigger
DropdownMenuTrigger.docstring: The button that toggles the dropdown menu.

properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior. Defaults to False.

DropdownMenuContent.name: DropdownMenuContent
DropdownMenuContent.docstring: The Dropdown Menu Content component that pops out when the dropdown menu is open.

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.description: Renders the Dropdown Menu Content in higher contrast

properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior. Defaults to False.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: When True, keyboard navigation will loop from last item to first, and vice versa. Defaults to False.

properties.name: force_mount
properties.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.

properties.name: side
properties.description: The preferred side of the trigger to render against when open. Will be reversed when collisions occur and `avoid_collisions` is enabled.The position of the tooltip. Defaults to "top".

properties.name: side_offset
properties.description: The distance in pixels from the trigger. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: align
properties.description: The preferred alignment against the trigger. May change when collisions occur. Defaults to "center".

properties.name: align_offset
properties.description: An offset in pixels from the "start" or "end" alignment options.

properties.name: avoid_collisions
properties.description: When true, overrides the side and align preferences to prevent collisions with boundary edges. Defaults to True.

properties.name: collision_padding
properties.description: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur. Accepts a number (same for all sides), or a partial padding object, for example: { "top": 20, "left": 20 }. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: sticky
properties.description: The sticky behavior on the align axis. "partial" will keep the content in the boundary as long as the trigger is at least partially in the boundary whilst "always" will keep the content in the boundary regardless. Defaults to "partial".

properties.name: hide_when_detached
properties.description: Whether to hide the content when the trigger becomes fully occluded. Defaults to False.

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.description: Override theme color for Dropdown Menu Content

DropdownMenuSubTrigger.name: DropdownMenuSubTrigger
DropdownMenuSubTrigger.docstring: An item that opens a submenu.

properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior. Defaults to False.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

properties.name: text_value
properties.description: Optional text used for typeahead purposes. By default the typeahead behavior will use the .textContent of the item. Use this when the content is complex, or you have non-textual content inside.

DropdownMenuSub.name: DropdownMenuSub
DropdownMenuSub.docstring: Contains all the parts of a submenu.

properties.name: open
properties.description: The controlled open state of the submenu. Must be used in conjunction with `on_open_change`.

properties.name: default_open
properties.description: The open state of the submenu when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

DropdownMenuSubContent.name: DropdownMenuSubContent
DropdownMenuSubContent.docstring: The component that pops out when a submenu is open. Must be rendered inside DropdownMenuSub.

properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior. Defaults to False.

properties.name: loop
properties.description: When True, keyboard navigation will loop from last item to first, and vice versa. Defaults to False.

properties.name: force_mount
properties.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.

properties.name: side_offset
properties.description: The distance in pixels from the trigger. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: align_offset
properties.description: An offset in pixels from the "start" or "end" alignment options.

properties.name: avoid_collisions
properties.description: When true, overrides the side and align preferences to prevent collisions with boundary edges. Defaults to True.

properties.name: collision_padding
properties.description: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur. Accepts a number (same for all sides), or a partial padding object, for example: { "top": 20, "left": 20 }. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: sticky
properties.description: The sticky behavior on the align axis. "partial" will keep the content in the boundary as long as the trigger is at least partially in the boundary whilst "always" will keep the content in the boundary regardless. Defaults to "partial".

properties.name: hide_when_detached
properties.description: Whether to hide the content when the trigger becomes fully occluded. Defaults to False.

properties.name: shortcut
properties.description: Shortcut to render a menu item as a link

properties.name: as_child
properties.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior. Defaults to False.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

properties.name: text_value
properties.description: Optional text used for typeahead purposes. By default the typeahead behavior will use the .textContent of the item. Use this when the content is complex, or you have non-textual content inside.

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.description: Override theme color for Dropdown Menu Item

DropdownMenuSeparator.name: DropdownMenuSeparator
DropdownMenuSeparator.docstring: Dropdown Menu Separator Component. Used to visually separate items in the dropdown menu.
